articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of PNA
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chief of PNA
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Mahmoud Abbas, chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, conveyed it to an official concerned on April 13.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Il from Family of Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Gift to Kim Jong Il from Family of Zhang Weihua
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and gift by the family of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr of China, on the occasions of the Day of the Sun and the 16th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The floral basket and gift were conveyed to an official concerned today by Zhang Qi, grand son of Zhang Weihua, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 They were handed to Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Pakistani Ambassador Noorullah Khan who is doyen of the corps on Monday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Head of Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the head of the visiting delegation of the Fenghuang Satellite TV of Hong Kong, China. 
					  The gift was handed to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Liu Changle, chairman of the Board of Directors and administrative manager of the Fenghuang Satellite TV of Hong Kong, China, who is heading the delegation, on April 13.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of  the Fenghuang Satellite TV of Hong Kong, China led by Liu Changle, chairman of the Board of Directors and administrative manager, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Algerian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Algerian President
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday sent a congratulatory message to Abdelaziz Bouteflika on the latter's reelection as President of Algeria.
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Algeria would grow stronger in the future, Kim in his message sincerely wished Bouteflika greater success in his work to consolidate the national unity and achieve the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here placed a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The guests paid floral tribute to him in boundless reverence as he devoted all his life to the world peace and the cause of global independence and made an immortal contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and other countries.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statue of Kim Il Sung from Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statue of Kim Il Sung from Japanese Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill Monday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun. 
					 The guests laid a floral basket and made bows to his statue, expressing boundless reverence for him who founded the immortal Juche idea, clearly indicating the road for progressive humankind to follow and making an undying contribution to the cause of global independence.
					
					 The delegation led by Takao Kamakura, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Different Places
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Different Places
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps, diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here visited the venue of the 11th Kimilsungia Festival Monday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests went round the flowers of the Sun in full bloom carrying the boundless reverence of the Korean people and world progressives for Kim Il Sung. They made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 That day the economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the art work exhibition hall of the Mansudae Art Studio, officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of various embassies here went round the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition and diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here visited the Central Zoo which was reconstructed on an expansion basis.

articles.title: Delegation of National Committee of CPPCC Here
articles.content:
Delegation of National Committee of CPPCC Here
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference headed by its Vice-Chairman Li Jinhua arrived here today.
					 The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea hosted a reception in honor of the delegation today.

articles.title: 11th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
11th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The 11th Kimilsungia festival was opened with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition here on April 13.
					Displayed in the venue of the festival are more than 20,000 potted Kimilsungias brought into bloom with sincerity by units of the Korean People's Army, ministries and national institutions, working people's organizations, scientific, educational, public health and media organs and enterprises, servicepersons, working people, school youth and children, Koreans overseas, diplomatic missions of different countries and missions of international organizations here, foreign friendly and public organizations, enterprises and figures and Chinese residents in the DPRK.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok , Yang Hyong Sop and others,  officials of ministries, national institutions and working people's organizations and working people, overseas compatriots' delegations, including the delegation of Koreans in Japan, and overseas compatriots, and the director of the Dewi Sukarno Office in Japan and the chairman of the American Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association who are honorary chairpersons of the Society for Supporting the Propagation of Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia, delegations of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia greenhouses in Dandong and Hunchun of China and delegations and members of associations for supporting the propagation of the immortal flowers across the region of China.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the Indonesian government cultural delegation and the Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK and his embassy officials.
					
					Kim Pyong Hun, chairman of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, said in his opening address that the festival is more meaningfully decorating the April holiday as it is taking place amid the immense excitement and joy at having General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the top post of the DPRK in the wake of the successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK has demonstrated to the world its dignity and might by winning victories and exalting its honor as it holds President Kim Il Sung in high esteem, he stressed that the Korean people became a proud people who were the first in the world to have Kimilsungia, an immortal flower going by the august name of the peerlessly great man, as the treasure of the country and the pride of the nation.
					
					 The festival will prove to be a flower festival expressing evermore ardent longing for Kim Il Sung, a great man, he noted.
					
					  Wardiyatmo, general secretary of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism of Indonesia who is heading the Indonesian government cultural delegation, made a congratulatory speech at the ceremony.
					
					 The participants looked round the venue of the festival with deep emotion.

articles.title: 26th ASFAF Goes on
articles.content:
26th ASFAF Goes on
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Performances of the 26th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were held before full houses at theaters here on Sunday.
					 The State Academy Ensemble Named after Sveshnikov of Russia which gave its premiere with the immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Il Sung" presented the immortal revolutionary paean "Song of General Kim Jong Il" at the second day of its performance, mesmerizing the audience. 
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in Japan presented solo dance "Drum Dance" and a Jangsaenap duet "Ryonggangginari," delighting the audience with rhythm strong in national flavor and Korean style tone.
					
					 A singer of the Vietnamese art troupe put on the stage a solo "No Motherland without You" and a musical group of the Moldovan State Symphony Orchestra a mixed duet "I Love You," etc. and Portuguese and Dutch artistes presented song "Aquarium" with high artistry. 
					
					 The Shanghai Symphony Orchestra of the Chinese art troupe successfully presented orchestras "Arirang" and "Song of Red Flag," electrifying the audience.
					
					 The art troupe of Koreans in China staged a female solo "I Wish to Be Near the Leader" and the art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans a female solo "Songun Nilliri" and other numbers.  
					
					 Ukrainian artistes presented dance "Dance of Cossacks" and others while the Delta saxophone quartet of Britain staged Korean song "Bellflower" and artistes of the "Concertante" musical trio of Cuba Korean song "I Will Be a Flower Heralding Spring before Others".
					
					 Male soloists of a group of famous artistes of the State Academy Grand Theatre Named after Naboi of Uzbekistan successfully sang Spanish and Italian songs, winning the high acclaim of the audience.
					
					 Artistes of the Beijing Opera Theatre of Jilin Province, China, showcased successes achieved by the Chinese people in creating the traditional Beijing opera with peculiar songs and dances, skillful martial arts and acrobatic skills. 
					
					 Russian, Chinese, Mongolian and Swedish acrobats put on the stage numbers including "Pair Aerial Flight", "Four-Man Etude", "Two-Man Etude" and "Unicycle Stunt".
					
					 Performances go on.

articles.title: Meetings Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
articles.content:
Meetings Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection as Chairman of NDC of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings and rallies for warmly congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il's reelection as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK were held on April 12, too.
					 Members of the trade union and other workers held a meeting at the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, agricultural workers in front of the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing in Chongsan-ri, Kangso County and members of the women's union at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said at the meetings that Kim Jong Il's reelection to the top post of the DPRK by the unanimous will of its army and people is the greatest honor and happiness of the nation and the expression of absolute support and trust of all the army and people in a peerlessly great man.
					
					 They spoke highly of the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by bringing about epoch-making changes in ideological, political, military, economic and all other fields with a prominent political caliber and extraordinary leadership and demonstrating the dignity and power of the Republic to the world.
					
					 They evinced their determination to fling open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President, by strikingly demonstrating the heroic spirit and stamina of Songun Korea in the present general advance characterized by the great revolutionary surge.
					
					 Present at the meetings held by working people's organizations were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the trade union, the union of agricultural workers and the women's union and working people.
					
					 Similar rallies were held in the seats of North Phyongan Province, Jagang Province and South and North Hamgyong Provinces, too.

articles.title: Lots of Gift Animals to Kim Il Sung from Many Countries
articles.content:
Lots of Gift Animals to Kim Il Sung from Many Countries
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Zoo of the DPRK is home to many rare animals from various parts of the world.
					 Among the animals are gift animals presented to President Kim Il Sung by world progressives.
					
					 The number of the gift animals which the President received from prominent figures, people from all walks of life from different parts of the world and compatriots overseas reached nearly 600 of 156 species.
					
					 More than 400 animals were presented to the President by party, state and government heads of dozens of countries including Indonesia, Benin, Democratic Congo, Mali and Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 The gift animals brought forth a lot of their young in the DPRK.
					
					 It was considered very hard to propagate wild animals in zoos, but the employees of the Central Zoo succeeded in making an Indian elephant give birth to its young before 10 years of its habitation there though it was the view of experts that at least 18 years were required for its reproduction. Even chimpanzee registered as an animal to be protected in the world for its low reproduction rate gave birth to two babies.
					
					 Hundreds of lemurs were bred in the Central Zoo and they found their habitats in local areas and other countries.
					
					 Dozens of species of gift animals such as crowned crane, brown zebu and parrot brought forth countless number of young.

articles.title: Book "Among the People" (79) Released
articles.content:
Book "Among the People" (79) Released
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out "Among the People" (79), a collection of memoirs.
					 Contained in the book are 18 pieces of memoirs telling about the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for the prosperity and development of the country and happiness of the people and for global independence and his noble popular traits.
					
					 Among them are reminiscences titled "How the Foundations for Rural Mechanization in Our County Have Been Laid" and "He Trained Us to be Competent Agricultural Officials" which tell that the President indicated the ways for increasing grain production one by one and carefully led an ordinary official with love and trust while traveling ceaseless journey of guidance to the countryside.
					
					 Memoirs "A Mineral Spring Associated with Paternal Love" and "For Development of Democratic Public Health" tell about the touching facts that when visiting a rest home after the liberation of the country, the President personally tasted mineral water there before instructing to use it for the improvement of working people's health and that he had worked heart and soul to develop the public health system in the country into a genuine health system for the people.
					
					 There are also such reminiscences as "Meticulous Love for Students of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School" and "Under the Care of the Great Sun" dealing with the facts that the President took warm care of the children of revolutionary martyrs and remembered a south Korean revolutionary with deep emotion.
					
					 "Always Giving Top Priority to the People's Interests," "Whenever Thinking of Spoon and Chopsticks Associated with Paternal Love," "Deep Care Shown for the Development of Small-scale Fishery" and other memoirs convey the deep benevolence of the President who dedicated his all to improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Reminiscences "'Young Girl Is Praiseworthy'" and "'You Should Keep the Homeland in Mind All the Time'" contain the touching stories that the President encouraged a girl weaver who distinguished herself in wartime production and implanted ardent patriotism into the mind of a student studying in other country when he visited it.
					
					 Memoirs "Saying That Sincere Help Should Be Given to Developing Countries" deals with the fact that the President rendered great encouragement to the world revolutionary people in the struggle for independence.

articles.title: Tower of Juche Idea Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Tower of Juche Idea Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of people at home, Koreans overseas and foreign friends are visiting the Tower of the Juche Idea standing on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang.
					 This grand tower was unveiled with a large attendance on April 15, Juche 71 (1982), the 70th birthday of President Kim Il Sung, representing the ardent desire of the Korean people and the world progressive people to hand down to posterity the ideological and theoretical exploits of the President, the founder of the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 A total of at least two million Koreans at home and compatriots overseas and foreign friends have visited the tower for 27 years since it was unveiled.

articles.title: Precious Tradition of Single-Minded Unity Established
articles.content:
Precious Tradition of Single-Minded Unity Established
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean people are striving hard to build a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country on this land with the might of the single-minded unity.
					 It is President Kim Il Sung who opened up the origin of the single-hearted unity, a mighty weapon for building the thriving nation, and laid down a durable foundation to win victory after victory by dint of the might of the unity.
					
					 He, who fathered the Juche idea in his early years and held aloft the banner of unity from the outset of the revolutionary struggle to lay its ideological base, regarded comradeship as most important thing for all forms of struggle and activities and crossed many death-lines for revolutionary comrades and people. In the course of this, he created a brilliant example of true comradeship.
					
					 The Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the anti-Japanese national united front body, was founded in May, Juche 25 (1936) as the first of its kind in Korea in accordance with the President's profound magnanimity and idea on the great national unity to rally close all the people loving the nation as one, transcending the differences in idea, political opinion and religious belief, and the Korean revolution emerged victorious with the strength of unity.
					
					 The Korean people accomplished the cause of the national liberation through the positive nation-wide anti-Japanese national united front movement, and under the banner of the President's idea on united front after the liberation of the country, too, they built the Workers' Party of Korea as a popular party and wrought epoch-making miracles in the Fatherland Liberation War against the U.S. imperialists and the complex social revolutions of two stages.
					
					The tradition of the single-minded unity created in the flames of the anti-Japanese struggle is brilliantly carried forward and the unity of the DPRK finds itself on a new higher phase as it has in its van General Secretary Kim Jong Il who is identical with the President in idea, leadership and virtues.
					
					 The whole Party has been imbued with the Songun idea, the entire army has shared the idea, will and destiny with the Supreme Commander and all the army and people have achieved the perfect identity in ideology and working method on the basis of the spirit of defending the leader with their very lives. This is the true feature of the DPRK's single-minded unity.
					
					 Thanks to the single-hearted unity under which the leader trusts in his army and people and the latters absolutely believe in and follow the former and share the will and destiny with him, the Korean people could wind up the "Arduous March" and the forced march victoriously and achieve eye-opening successes which serve as a solid springboard for the construction of a rich and powerful nation.
					
					 The Korean people will carry forward the tradition of unity provided by the President down through generations and build a prosperous and powerful nation on this land without fail as the President wished.

articles.title: Title to Peerlessly Great Man
articles.content:
Title to Peerlessly Great Man
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- April 13 marks the passage of 17 years since the title of Generalissimo of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was awarded to President Kim Il Sung.
					Consummated in this title are the great exploits performed for the motherland and the people by President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the heroic Korean People's Army(KPA), the revolutionary armed forces of the Workers' Party of Korea, and the ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander and gifted military strategist who led the revolutionary wars against the U.S. and Japanese imperialists to shining victories.
					
					Having set out on the road of revolution in his teens, he founded the first revolutionary armed forces on April 25, Juche 21 (1932) and led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory, thus routing the Japanese imperialists and accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					After the liberation of the country, he strengthened and developed the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into regular revolutionary armed forces and led the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) against the armed invasion of the imperialist allied forces headed by the U.S. imperialists to a brilliant victory, defending the freedom and independence of the country with credit.
					
					This was a great victory brought by the brilliant commanding art and original Juche-based tactics of President Kim Il Sung, the illustrious commander born by humankind.
					
					After the war he firmly defended the security of the country and the people and further strengthened the KPA into revolutionary armed forces each being a match for a hundred, smashing the aggressive machinations of the imperialists and the reactionaries at every step.
					
					And he set forth the military line of self-reliant defense and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress, thus displaying the great might of invincible socialist Korea and rendering active support and encouragement to the struggle of the world progressives for independence against imperialism.
					
					The long-standing wish of the Korean people and army was achieved when the title of generalissimo, the highest title, was awarded to President     Kim Il Sung on April 13, Juche 81 (1992) on the occasion of his 80th birthday, who founded the unquenchable revolutionary armed forces of Juche and led them along one road of victory and glory to perform great feats for the country and the revolution.

articles.title: Fascist Suppression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fascist Suppression Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils made public a statement on April 9 in denunciation of the fascist clique's crackdown on members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 The statement charged that on April 3 the prosecution brought the said members to trial and demanded heavy penalties up to nine years' imprisonment for them.
					
					 Those incriminating the struggle for the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and desperately trying to check the reunification movement will be surely punished by history, it warned.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government", it said, is getting hell-bent on the repression by employing all the tricks to maintain its existence, but such moves will only accelerate its own downfall.
					
					 The statement urged the authorities to stop the suppression of those members of the solidarity, who have devotedly worked for national reunification, and set them free at once.

articles.title: Murder of Evacuees Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Murder of Evacuees Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The All-People Committee for Measures against the Murder of Evacuees in Ryongsan of south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on April 8, declaring that a large-scale struggle would be staged to condemn the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its killing of evacuees.
					 The organization charged that the Lee Myung Bak "government" has uttered no word of apology for the crime it committed by mercilessly killing Ryongsan evacuees and, on the contrary, is incriminating the evacuees.
					
					 It stated that it would conduct a vigorous struggle in solidarity with other organizations of different circles standing against the authorities' unpopular policies.
					
					The organization declared that it would hold a memorial meeting for the slain evacuees on April 29, 100 days since the Ryongsan tragic case, and stage a large-scale struggle involving 100,000 people in Seoul on May 2.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Despicable Distortion of History Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Despicable Distortion of History Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries persist in their despicable efforts to tamper with their history.
					 On April 9, the Japanese reactionaries let another history textbook for middle schoolers justifying Japan's aggression in the past pass the screening process.
					
					 The textbook has contents justifying Japanese imperialists' aggression and colonial rule over the Korean Peninsula and distorting the historical facts such as the sexual slavery and forcible drafting.
					
					The textbook openly describes the Pacific war as the "Greater East Asia war" and hides Japan's past crimes and preaches the revival of militarism, asserting that Japan was a victim unavoidably involved in the war due to the Western powers including the U.S. and Britain.
					
					 Conveying this fact, the south Korean MBC said the "Fusosha Publishing Inc." was only renamed "Jiyusha Publishing Inc." and the distortions made in the textbook published by the "Fusosha Publishing Inc." four years ago remain almost the same.
					
					 It was reportedly due to the protest movement of the Japanese civic organizations at that time that the history textbook published by the "Fusosha Publishing Inc." was rejected by Japanese schools.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Hail DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Cha Sang Bo, vice-chairman of the General Association of Koreans in China, released a statement on April 8 in support of the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The statement said that the DPRK perfectly put the satellite, developed by its own wisdom and technology 100 percent, into orbit at one launch, which marked an occasion of demonstrating the high level of its Juche-based ultramodern science and technology.
					
					 The successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-2 strikingly demonstrated to the whole world once again the fact that no force can match the strength of Juche Korea guided by Kim Jong Il, the brilliant Songun commander of Mt. Paektu, and it dealt a telling blow to all the enemies that so viciously slandered the DPRK's launch of satellite, it stressed.
					
					 The statement said with high appreciation that the DPRK led by Kim Jong Il is displaying its might as an invincible, strong country all over the world.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- An Italian political party and a Swiss organization made public statements on April 6 in celebration of the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					 The Unified Communist Party of Italy said in its statement that the satellite launch would be greatly conducive to the development of space science and telecommunications technology in the DPRK and it is giving great confidence and encouragement to different nations and peoples working to create a new life while taking their destinies in their own hands.
					
					 The party firmly affirms that it will fully support the Korean people in the efforts to build an economic power, the statement stressed.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee said in its statement that Kwangmyongsong-2 would serve for the DPRK's scientific research into space for peaceful purposes. The successful launch of the satellite is a great victory of the DPRK's Juche-based science and technology and gives a great national pride to all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas, it added.
					
					 The statement slashed at the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers distorting the satellite launch as "launch of long-range missile" and crying out for "sanctions" at the UNSC.
					
					 The DPRK has a right to launch satellite like all other countries, it said.

articles.title: Int'l Organization Refutes Smear Campaign over DPRK's Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Int'l Organization Refutes Smear Campaign over DPRK's Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea made public a statement on April 5 denouncing the smear campaign of the United States and its followers over the DPRK's satellite launch.
					 The statement branded their false propaganda as an extremely provocative and reckless action.
					
					 The U.S. and the countries toeing its policy have perpetrated many crimes such as refusing to fulfill their commitments to the nuclear disarmament, build nuclear-free zones and accede CCW but they dare chide the DPRK's satellite launch, it noted, and went on:
					
					 They refuse to criticize Japan for working hard to turn itself into a military power, but are trying to create an impression that the DPRK arouses "apprehension" of Japan.
					
					 The imperialist forces' policy of applying double standards whereby they neglect the sovereignty of other countries has been revealed again over the recent satellite launch of the DPRK.
					
					 The statement stressed that media of the U.S. and other Western countries are kicking up a hysteric campaign against the DPRK's satellite launch but what it did entirely conforms to international laws on the use of space.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" was brought out in booklet on April 4 by the Morelos Branch of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that ideology should be adhered to and priority given to ideological work over anything else to successfully accomplish socialism, the basic task of ideological work is to colour the whole of society with socialist ideology and ideological work must be carried out in accordance with principles and methods which meet the intrinsic requirements of socialism.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement on April 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 The statement noted that all the members of the People's Socialist Party join the Korean people in significantly commemorating the Day of the Sun.
					
					 As a brilliant model for the Mexican people, the great life and exploits of President Kim Il Sung are encouraging their struggle, it said, adding:
					
					 The Mexican people know well about the history of struggle conducted by the Korean people under the wise guidance of the President who dedicated all his life to the national liberation and the cause of building socialism in the country.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il is pursuing the Songun politics based on the Juche idea. The validity and vitality of the Juche idea and the Songun politics were clearly displayed in the late 20th century when socialism collapsed in the former Soviet Union and Eastern European countries.
					
					 Today the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung is giving play to its tremendous vitality, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Different Countries
Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- A lecture meeting was held by the South African national preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun, a joint seminar and a photo show by the British preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and remembrance meetings by the Finland-Korea Society and the National Democratic Party of Egypt between April 2 and 5 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					On display at the venues of events were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing their immortal feats.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party, said in the lecture titled "Human cause of independence and President Kim Il Sung" that Kim Il Sung enjoys unbounded reverence from the world progressive people as not only the eternal President of the Korean people but also the great pioneer of the human cause of independence.
					
					 Ella Rule, vice-chairman of the C.C., Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), said in a report that Kim Il Sung defeated the two imperialisms, the U.S. and Japan, and built a rich and powerful, prosperous socialist system in Korea, thus proving the superiority of socialism over capitalism in practice.
					
					 Keith Bennet, deputy director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in a speech that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for global independence until the last moments of his life since he embarked on the road of revolution in his teens would remain forever in the hearts of the progressive humankind.
					
					 Esko Koskinen, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, in a speech highly praised the undying feats performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the world revolution. And he expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and reunify the country under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Youssef Amin Wali, vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party of Egypt, said that the Korean people have made signal achievements in building a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is creditably carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung. The successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 is a clear proof of them, he added.
					
					 A letter and a message to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Britain and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores de Mahmoud Abbas
  Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores que le dedicara el Jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, en ocasion del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y del 16o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  El embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo entrego el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y regalo de familia de Zhang Weihua
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y regalo de familia de Zhang Weihua
Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores y regalo que le dirigiera la familia del martir revolucionario antijapones de China, Zhang Weihua, con motivo del Dia del Sol y de su eleccion como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  Zhang Qi, nieto de ese martir, de visita en Corea, los entrego el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de jefe de delegacion de Hong Kong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de jefe de delegacion de Hong Kong
  Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara el jefe de la delegacion de la TV via satelite Fenghung de Hong Kong, China, de visita en Corea.
					  Liu Changle, presidente del consejo de directores y administrador de esa cadena de TV, quien preside esa delegacion, lo entrego el dia 13 al vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Yang Hyong Sop.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del Cuerpo Diplomatico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe cesto de flores y carta del Cuerpo Diplomatico
  Pyongyang, 13 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el cesto de flores y la carta de felicitacion que le dirigiera el Cuerpo Diplomatico en Corea con motivo del Dia del Sol (15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung).
					  El embajador pakistani y jefe de ese cuerpo, Noorullah Khan, los entrego el dia 13 al canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun.
